## Ex 7.1

### (a)
$$\phi_{B0}=0.65\unit{eV}$$
$$I_{sT}=AA^*T^2\exp\frac{-\phi_{B0}}{V_T}=2.948\times10^{-8}\unit{A}$$

#### (i)
$$V_a=V_t\ln\frac{I}{I_{sT}}=0.151\unit{V}$$

#### (ii)
$$V_a=V_t\ln\frac{I}{I_{sT}}=0.211\unit{V}$$

#### (iii)
$$V_a=V_t\ln\frac{I}{I_{sT}}=0.270\unit{V}$$
